---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Provides an easy way to retrieve Sumo Logic auth details.
## Attributes reference

The following attributes are exported:

- `access_id` - Sumo Logic access ID.
- `environment` - API endpoint environment.


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using SumoLogic = Pulumi.SumoLogic;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var current = Output.Create(SumoLogic.GetCallerIdentity.InvokeAsync());
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-sumologic/sdk/go/sumologic"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := sumologic.GetCallerIdentity(ctx, nil, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
